Title: The Pine Bluff Variant
Plot: Scully fears that Mulder has gone to the other side when she sees him assisting a federal suspect escape custody. In truth he has infiltrated a terrorist group testing a deadly biological weapon that can eat through a person's flesh.
GuestStars: J. B. Bivens, Douglas Arthurs, John B. Lowe, Ralph Alderman, Dean McKenzie, Kate Braidwood, Armin Moattar, Daniel Von Bargen, Michael McRae, Sam Anderson
